media:group.media:title: React Just Changed Forever
media:group.media:description:
React Conf just happened, and it's been a wild ride. React 19 is out, but that's old news. We're here for something almost forgotten, something I've wanted for awhile.
The React Compiler is here. I'm so hyped.
SOURCES https://playground.react.dev https://react.dev/learn/react-compiler https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYHBHK37xlE https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/29061
Check out my Twitch, Twitter, Discord more at https://t3.gg
S/O Ph4seOn3 for the awesome edit üôè

entry.title: How was this not in the browser before???

media:group.media:title: How was this not in the browser before???
media:group.media:description:
YOUTUBE DESTROYED MY DESCRIPTION WTF
Popover API is so overdue and I'm pumped it's here. Popper and FloatingUI carried us this far, but the future of tooltips is bright
SOURCES https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Popover_API https://twitter.com/chancethedev/status/1789037040161747361 https://web.dev/blog/popover-api https://codepen.io/web-dot-dev/pen/RwOvjrv https://developer.chrome.com/blog/anchor-positioning-api
Ty Ph4se0n3 for the edit!

entry.title: This Release Makes Me Want To Leave React...

media:group.media:title: This Release Makes Me Want To Leave React...
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: AWS S3 Is Having Some Serious Issues...

media:group.media:title: AWS S3 Is Having Some Serious Issues...
media:group.media:description:
The slow death of S3 has been happening for awhile now. As AWS's first service, it was kind of inevitable. So much so that I started an alternative.
Speaking of that - https://uploadthing.com ;)
SOURCES https://medium.com/@maciej.pocwierz/how-an-empty-s3-bucket-can-make-your-aws-bill-explode-934a383cb8b1 https://twitter.com/jeffbarr/status/1787844682216792163

media:group.media:title: The End Of StackOverflow
media:group.media:description:
StackOverflow is being eaten by ChatGPT. Now it's desperately trying to catch up. Will this be the end of StackOverflow (and maybe the rest of the internet)? Idk man I just talk about stuff and write code

entry.title: CSS Is 2.4x Slower Than Inline Styles (Oh No...)

media:group.media:title: CSS Is 2.4x Slower Than Inline Styles (Oh No...)
media:group.media:description:
I hate to share this with you all. But if I have to have this cursed knowledge, so do you. Inline styles being faster than CSS is not too surprising. The speed difference, however, is a bit insane.
SOURCE https://danielnagy.me/posts/Post_tsr8q6sx37pl
Check out my Twitch, Twitter, Discord more at https://t3.gg

media:group.media:title: The Problem With UUIDs
media:group.media:description:
THANK YOU PLANETSCALE FOR SPONSORING THIS VIDEO

media:group.media:title: Life After SQL (EdgeDB Is Fascinating)
media:group.media:description:
Disclaimer: I am an advisor for EdgeDB, I do not ship it in production (I still build my services on PlanetScale)
EdgeDB is getting pretty dang exciting. The idea of a "more relational" db is something I hadn't thought about enough before. Excited to see what they cook!
SOURCES https://twitter.com/edgedatabase/status/1782485844814647402 https://www.edgedb.com/blog/we-can-do-better-than-sql#null-a-bag-of-surprises
